items.text: In the new Android 5.0 material design guidelines, the style guidelines have changed to discourage the use of the icon in the ActionBar.
items.href: Defining The ActionBar | CodePath Android Cliffnotes

items.text: Although the icon can be added back with:
items.href: Defining The ActionBar | CodePath Android Cliffnotes
Defining The ActionBar | CodePath Android Cliffnotes

items.text: You can read more about this on the material design guidelines which state: "The use of application icon plus title as a standard layout is discouraged on API 21 devices and newer."
items.href: Defining The ActionBar | CodePath Android Cliffnotes
